EmailTemplate.name: MRC-DTP Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LSTM MRC Doctoral Training Partnership Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Student_Programme__c.Student__c}
Programme: {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c} Application Status: {!Student_Programme__c.Stage__c}
Thank you for registering to apply for the MRC Doctoral Training Partnership.
We’re writing to let you know that you have not yet submitted your application form which still appears as a draft application.
Please login to MyLSTM to complete your application and submit it at your earliest convenience.
I would like to remind you that the MRC Doctoral Training Partnership call closes at 23:59 on 3rd January 2016 and draft applications will not be considered.
Just as a reminder, the username you used to login with is: {!Student_Programme__c.Personal_Email__c}
If you do not remember your password, please use the “forgot your password?” facility which is on the login page at https://mylstm.com/apply.
If you have any problems, or need any assistance with your application, please contact us via email at mrcdtp@lstmed.ac.uk.
Best,
The MRC DTP Team
The Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine Pembroke Place Liverpool L3 5QA
